LanguageData.PTR01sl.degreeDatas.0.label: <color=#CDCDCD>Snobbish</color>
LanguageData.PTR01sl.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] loves power. [PAWN_pronoun] is always chasing higher noble titles.
LanguageData.PTR02qg.degreeDatas.0.label: <color=#CDCDCD>Lofty</color>
LanguageData.PTR02qg.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] ignores power. [PAWN_pronoun] hates the title of nobility.
